title: Character height adjustments should come along with texture updates
body: Because Summoners Rift looks like a Toy Story with different toy soldiers. If I'm being correct, Sona's height was adjusted when she has received new textures. It just hurts me to realise that Vladimir's Soulstealer is much taller than his legendary skin Blood Lord.
